KeyPair.Description: SSH key that will be used for EC2 instances (set up in web console)
KeyPair.ConstraintDescription: needs to be an existing EC2 keypair (set up in web console)

SSHAllowIPAddress.Description: IP address to allow SSH from (only /32s allowed)
SSHAllowIPAddress.ConstraintDescription: needs to be in A.B.C.D/32 form

CIDRBlockVPC.Description: CIDR block for VPC network (only /16s allowed)
CIDRBlockVPC.ConstraintDescription: needs to be in A.B.C.D/16 form

CIDRBlockNAT.Description: CIDR block for NAT subnet (only /24s allowed)
CIDRBlockNAT.ConstraintDescription: needs to be in A.B.C.D/24 form

CIDRBlockWeb.Description: CIDR block for Web subnet (only /24s allowed)
CIDRBlockWeb.ConstraintDescription: needs to be in A.B.C.D/24 form

CIDRBlockApp.Description: CIDR block for App subnet (only /24s allowed)
CIDRBlockApp.ConstraintDescription: needs to be in A.B.C.D/24 form

CIDRBlockDB0.Description: CIDR block for DB0 subnet (only /24s allowed)
CIDRBlockDB0.ConstraintDescription: needs to be in A.B.C.D/24 form

CIDRBlockDB1.Description: CIDR block for DB1 subnet (only /24s allowed)
CIDRBlockDB1.ConstraintDescription: needs to be in A.B.C.D/24 form

DBName.ConstraintDescription: must begin with a letter and contain only alphanumeric characters.

DBUser.ConstraintDescription: must begin with a letter and contain only alphanumeric characters.

DBInstanceClass.ConstraintDescription: must select a valid database instance type.

MultiAZDatabase.Description: Create a Multi-AZ MySQL Amazon RDS database instance
MultiAZDatabase.ConstraintDescription: must be either true or false.

InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

Fn::Join: echo 'You are accessing InstanceWeb01 server via ELB' > /var/www/html/index.html
echo 'You are accessing InstanceWeb02 server via ELB' > /var/www/html/index.html

Properties.DBSubnetGroupDescription: Subnet group for the RDS DBInstance

NatIPAddr.Description: IP address of the NAT instance (shell to this address)
